T02bsa005_u:3: phullatāmeti hṛtpadmaṃ taṃ vande puruṣottamam // Csp_1 //
T02bsa005_u:4: pāramiṃ guhyamantraṃ ca śritvā bodhiḥ prasidhyati /

T02bsa005_u:13: rātreḥ pūrve 'pare bhāge na suptvā yogamācaret // Csp_6 //
T02bsa005_u:15: rātrerbhāgatrayaṃ kṛtvā hyantye bhāge tu jāgṛyāt // Csp_7 //

T02bsa005_u:36: pūrṇeṣu dinakṛtyeṣu bhāge ca prathame niśaḥ /
T02bsa005_u:37: dharmatā niṣprapañcāpi tathā cittaṃ ca yojayet // Csp_18 //
